ratings.comment: A truly awful professor.  I have greatly enjoyed the GWS professors in Madison, but this professor really let me down.  She talks all the time about how wants us to feel free to speak, but anytime someone talks she tends to cut them off with her own thoughts.  She also will ask questions that she clearly wants only her own opinions repeated back.

This professor is almost top-notch. She needs to improve on some aspects of her teaching. She is extremely knowledgeable and engaged, impressive in her credentials, very empowering. Problems: she needs to give more constructive feedback to her students so they can improve their work, Make her expectations clearer, make herself more avail for help.

She missed around 4-5 of 12 total classes, complimented everyone's piece ridiculously (not someone to go to for honest commentary!), and was often disorganized and confused. Clogged our e-mail accounts, gave us no indication of how we were doing in the class, and never used any of the readings, though of course we were always expected to read them.
Not a course you'll regret taking.
Knows her stuff and is very into the subject matter, can be a little eccentric and sometimes dismissive.  Hand in a paper to her and you'll never see it again.
Came to 4 classes and gave people B's as their final grades.
